---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
fit1 <- lmer(log.oy ~ log.AFR + (log.AFR | order), data=orders1)
summary(fit1)
lme4::ranef(fit1)
tidy(fit1, conf.int=TRUE)
broom::augment(fit1) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=log.AFR, y=.fixed)) +
    geom_line(color="Red") +
    geom_line(aes(y=.fitted, color=order)) +
    geom_point(aes(x=log.AFR, y=log.oy, color=order), alpha=0.15) +
    team_theme()
```

```{r}
fit2 <- glm(log.oy ~ log.AFR, data=orders1)
summary(fit2)
tidy(fit2, conf.int=TRUE)
broom::augment(fit2) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=log.AFR, y=.fitted)) +
    geom_line() +
    geom_point(aes(x=log.AFR, y=log.oy)) +
    geom_line(aes(y=.fitted)) +
    team_theme()
```

```{r}
MuMIn::model.sel(fit1, fit2, rank=AIC)
```
